person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Hooded protesters threw burning bottles and other objects at police in Pamplona after the protest organised by Herri Batasuna , the political wing of Basque separatist group ETA .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Hooded protesters |
| Police |
| Herri Batasuna |
| Basque separatist group ETA |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Hooded protesters |
| Police |
| Herri Batasuna |
| Basque separatist group ETA |

Note: In this context, "Basque separatist group ETA" refers to a group of people who are part of ETA. Therefore, it is considered a valid "Person" entity.
